56524.「<pc>さん！\n 踊り子の衣装は 見つかった！？:
<pc>! Did you find the dancer
costume?!

56526.「えっ そんな……。\n 本当は 取り返してきてくれたんだよね？:
But... why? You really did get it back,
didn't you?

56528.「そうだよっ これだよっ。\n ジャンナさんが着ていたのと おんなじヤツ！\n:
Yes, this is it! Just like the one Janna
wore! Thanks a bunch!

56529.「わがまま言って ゴメンね。\n ボク……今度の舞台 これを着て踊れるの\n す:
Sorry I was being so selfish. Truth is... I
was really looking forward to dancing with
this for the upcoming performance.

56530.「これを着て 最後まで踊りきれば\n あこがれのジャンナさんに\n 近づけるんじ:
I thought if I wore it, and danced the entire
thing... I'd be more like Janna.

56531.「あっ！！ もう出番が来ちゃう。\n <pc>さんも 楽しませてあげるから\n:
Well, that's my cue! Make sure to come and
watch me in the courtyard!

56532.「正気なのか ゾデラ！\n 大神官になるのを 辞退するだと！？:
Are you out of your mind, Zodera?! You don't
want to become High Priest anymore?!

56533.「……大神官さま。ジャンナを失った後\n 一座を去り 失意の底を さまよっていた:
High Priest... after the loss of Janna and
leaving my troupe, I wandered in deep
depression... but you gave me salvation.

56534.「その恩に報いるため 新たな大神官となることが\n 私の道なのだと 思っていまし:
I thought I could repay that debt by becoming
the new High Priest. But when I saw Gizant and
the others perform today...

56535.「彼らのもとに戻ることを\n どうか お許しいただけないでしょうか？: Please... will you allow me to return to them?

56536.「何を言っているのだ ゾデラ！\n お前は まさか あの一座にいたのか？:
What are you talking about, Zodera?!
You're telling me you used to be in that
troupe?

56537.「そうだ。私の本当の名は シタル。\n あの一座の座長を 務めていた。:
That's right. My real name is Sitar. I was the
head of that troupe.

56539.「よい顔をしているな ゾデラ。\n それが 本当のそなたの顔なのじゃな。\n や:
That's a good look for you, Zodera. I can
finally see your true face now.

56540.「本当の自分を 発揮できる職こそが天職。\n 人を天職へ導くことも\n 我らダー:
A vocation is a way to express your true self.
It is our role as Abbey Priests to guide
people to their calling.

56541.「それゆえ わしは ギザント一座を呼び寄せた。\n 一座の者たちの苦労と努力を:
That's why I called Gizant's troupe here. I
wanted to know your feelings after witnessing
all of their hard work.

56542.「つまり 今回 余興で一座を呼んだのは\n わしの仕込みだったわけじゃ。\n ほ:
In other words, it was my idea to invite the
troupe for the entertainment this time.
Hohoho!

56543.「なんと……。大神官さまの お心づかいに\n 感謝の言葉も ございません。:
I... I truly cannnot thank you enough for
your thoughtfulness.

56544.「おっしゃるとおり 私は天職を見つけました。\n シタルとして 一座に戻り\n:
It's just as you said... I've found my
calling. As Sitar, I vow to return to my
troupe and purse the art of performance.

56545.「ゾデラさん！ あなたが\n シタル座長だって どういうこと？\n なんで……ど:
Mr. Zodera! You're really Sitar, aren't you?!
Why... why didn't you tell me?!

56546.「悪い。こいつに押し切られてな。\n あんたのことを 話しちまったよ。:
Sorry 'bout that. She wouldn't stop houndin'
me about it, so I spilled the beans.

56547.「かまわんさ。私は シタルに戻ると決めた。\n ゾデラの名は もう いらないんだ:
No worries. I've decided to return as Sitar
again. I don't need the name Zodera anymore.

56549.「そして できれば……。\n 私を ふたたび 一座に入れてもらえないか？\n 勝:
And, if possible... would you allow me to join
the troupe again? I know it sounds selfish
for me to ask, but...

56550.「いいや 思わんね。\n うちの一座の座長は 今も昔も あんただ。\n そうだろ:
Nah, it's fine! Ya' always have been the
leader of the troupe. Ain't dat right,
Chairman Sitar!

56551.「……ありがとう ギザント。\n こんな私を 座長と呼んでくれるのだな。:
Thank you, Gizant... for calling me Chairman
once again.

56552.「リィディ。希望の花の丘では すまなかった。\n あの時の私は もはや どんな芸:
I'm sorry for what happened at Hope Hill. I
was so convinced that no performance would
be able to change my heart...

56553.「だが お前の踊りに 心を動かされた。\n お前の踊りには チカラがある。\n:
But I was moved by your dance... it has a
special power. Let's discover it together.

56554.「はいっ よろしくお願いします。\n ボク ジャンナさんみたいに\n すごい踊り:
Yes, of course! I want to dance just as
amazingly as Janna did!

56555.「大神官さま。長い間 お世話になりました。\n それでは……。:
I very much appreciate the hospitality you've
given me.

56557.「あなたと手に入れた 希望の花のつぼみ……\n ちゃんと 花が咲いたんだ！\n:
The Wish Flower bud that I picked... it
bloomed! My dream came true!

56558.「……じつはね ボク この花に\n こう お願いしたんだ。昔のシタル一座に\n:
Actually, the wish that I made to the
flower... it was the chance to see the old
Sitar troupe again.

56559.「そしたら まさか シタル座長が\n 一座に戻ってくれることになるなんて……。\:
And that's when Sitar suddenly decided to come
back... looks what they say about the flower
is true, isn't it?

56560.「ボク これからは\n シタル一座の一員として がんばるから！\n 応援してね:
From now on, I'll do my best as a member of
Sitar's troupe! Keep cheering for me,
<pc>!

56561.「わしの仕込みが ここまで\n うまくいったのは そなたのおかげじゃのう！\n:
It's thanks to you that my preparation has
gone so well! Please accept this as a token
of my courtesy.

56562.「さて。大神官の任は わしが続けなくてはな。\n この天職をまっとうすべく がん:
Well, I shall continue to serve as High
Priest. I will do my best to fulfill my
calling. Ho-ho-ho!

56563.「……さあ 皆さん！ 美しい歌声と\n ゆかいな曲芸で 楽しんだ後は\n いよい:
Ladies 'n gentlemen! We hope ya' enjoyed the
great singin' and fancy acrobatics! Now,
here's what ya' all been waitin' for!

56564.「当ギザント一座の 花形スター！\n リィディ嬢の踊りで トリを飾りましょう！！:
The shinin' star o' the Gizant Troupe! Little
miss Liddy will dance the night away!

56566.リィディは 床のくぼみに足を取られ\n派手に 転んでしまった！:
Liddy's foot was caught in a hole in the
floor, and she fell with a thud!

56567.「あら……。大丈夫なのかしら あの娘。: Oh my... I hope she's all right.

56569.「あんなに練習したのに……。\n 失敗しちゃうなんて……。: I practiced so hard... only to fail...

56570.「やっぱり ボクなんかじゃ……。: I knew it... I knew I wasn't good enough...

56571.「立て！ 立って 踊るんだ！！: Stand up! Stand up and dance!!

56572.「芸が終わるのは 客の拍手が鳴った時！\n お前の芸は まだ終わっていないぞ！！:
The act isn't over until you hear that
roaring applause! Don't give up!

56573.「何があろうと 最後まで やり抜け！\n ジャンナは 決して あきらめなかったぞ:
No matter what happens, you have to finish
what you started! Janna never gave up!
Neither should you!!

56574.「そうだよ。ボクは 踊りを見てくれた人\n みんなを幸せにするんだ。\n ジャン:
That's right... I want everyone who watches me
dance to feel happy. Just like Janna did...

56576.リィディは チカラ強く ステップを踏み\nふたたび 踊りはじめた。:
Liddy's feet moved courageously as she began
to dance once again.

56577.踊りに 見入っていた人々から\n少しの間をおいて 大きな拍手が巻き起こり\nギザ:
After a brief pause, the applause roared
throughout the courtyard. The performance had
come to a satisfying conclusion!

56578.「いやはや 最後の踊り……。\n 特に 一度 倒れてしまってからの踊りは\n 本:
Incredible, that last dance was truly
captivating! Even managing to get back up
after such a hard fall!

56579.「さて。余興は 終わりじゃ。\n いよいよ 任命式をおこなうとするぞ。:
Well, that's all for the show. Let us begin
the Appointing Ceremony.

56580.「神官ゾデラ。神官ジュアロの２名は\n 準備のため わしの部屋へ 来るがよい。:
Zodera, Juaro, you two may come to my office
for preparation.

56583.「おお そうじゃ。すまんが そなたも\n ２階のわしの部屋まで 来てくれるか。\:
Oh, I almost forgot. Could you please come
upstairs to my office? I would love to show
my thanks.

56584.「あの……ゾデラさん。あなたの言葉で\n ボクは 最後まで 踊ることができました:
Um... Mr. Zodera. It's thanks to your words
that I was able to keep dancing.

56585.「でも なんで あの時 あんな言葉を\n ボクに かけてくれたんですか？\n あ:
But why did you encourage me like that? Who
are you, really...?

94238.その踊りは 優雅で 気高く\n見る者すべてを魅了し\n人々に 笑顔を与えていく…:
Her dance, graceful and gentle, captivated
those who watched, bringing smiles to all
of their faces...

94239.神官ゾデラも 片時も目を離すことなく\nリィディを 見つめつづけ……\n彼女は:
Zodera never took his eyes off of Liddy, not
even for a single moment... she danced with
all her heart to the very end.
